OwlMaps.ID

  • Our Team

Keeping you Alert.

An app that shows you criminal information of a location, and alerts you with cautionary message when you enter that location.

"Personal Security is a Personal Responsibility!"

Summarized Crime

Displays a map to show a certain location point that has a history of crime. The details of the crime information will appear as a modal when the marker tapped.

Search Location

Finding the location through the search bar, then you will get information about crime events around and find out the potential threats from around the area.

Notification By Area

We will send notifications when you enters an area that has a criminal record.

Free to Use

OwlMaps is free to download and use!

Stop waiting.
Start alerting.

Get the app now!
